input.sentences: there was a really cool event that i got to be a part of .
a lot of people gathered for a convention where some presentations were given .
the leaders sat at a table in front of everybody as they gave their presentations .
everybody was really into the presentations and were taking notes .
at the end | it was time to tear the camera down . i feel very lucky that i got see these presentations .
output.sentences: Tammy had plans to go to a cool event.
A lot of people were going to give presentations about their writing.
The people giving the presentations sat at a long table in the front of the room.
The audience was taking note on the presentations.
Finally, it was time to tear herself away from the presentations and give an interview.
